title: ICEYE US receives first task order under NASA commercial smallsat data acquisition program
key_assets: archive of tens of thousands of ICEYE images
summary: ICEYE US Inc received its first Task Order under a Blanket Purchase Agreement (BPA) with NASA, allowing NASA to acquire ICEYE’s SAR data for evaluation by scientific and academic communities. The agreement marks a milestone for commercial SAR in the U.S. and enables advanced time series analysis of Earth’s surface for NASA’s Earth Science research.
why_it_matters: This contract represents a significant step in NASA’s Commercial Smallsat Data Acquisition (CSDA) Program, leveraging private sector investments to enhance public Earth science research. It highlights the growing role of commercial SAR data in complementing NASA’s capabilities and supporting critical research in geology, climate change, and natural resource management.
